fullText: This lavishly mounted stage adaptation of the beloved 1964 Disney film proves that sometimes more really can be more, delivering a family-friendly spectacle that should enchant children and adults alike.

The critic believes the show will appeal to both children and adults. | Kimi: The critic offers unqualified praise for the production values ('lavishly mounted,' 'spectacle') and predicts it will 'enchant' audiences of all ages, indicating a strong recommendation without significant reservations.
